name: Wakeboarding
description:
Single Player  challenging points-trial racing game where you try over and over again to improve your points. Dodge the mounds with the motorboat. Take it with the skier to get points.

Left/Right Arrows: Turn left/rigth the motorboat.

A/D: Turn left/right the skier.

This prototype has been developed for the trijam 159 from scratch. Only the intro, popup and background music was premade by me.
